op is a nice place to kick things off

It takes a lot of time when you are working on your own idea
im trying to finish all by the mid of this months so happy to share my learning after that
Best of luck with your funding
took a while but finally secured most of funds
happy to help out your raise if i can
Lets schedule a call sometime this week
building smth and learning new things
We got a lead investor and trying to close our round
Your advice and starting with angel investors really helped us a lot and we were able to close 30 of the round before the lead came in
We are now setting up hiring pipelines and finding integrations with different projects now
Did you and your co founders signed a cofounders agreement I had some doubts that I wanted to clear
Nope and thats why we got into the trouble
I highly recommend singing agreement on stock ip Nondisclosure of internal information
Long story so will share someday
Also be clear on who is the final decision maker
Thats what we are currently discussing
How the vesting would go and how to measure the performance metrics
For this we have divided things based on the roles and overlapping decision will be taken in board meetings

So many things are overlapping each other and have to make decisions quickly in startups I strongly recommend discussing this asap cuz this was one the main reason why we got in trouble and had to shut down our startup
Can we get on a call Would like to know what all can go wrong
We can do whenever you are free
im free for the next 30min so now or 3or4pm argentina time would work
Lets get on a call now
